production_title: Shinchan & Ben 10: Alien Masti in Kasukabe

scenes.one_liner: Ben Tennyson unexpectedly arrives at Shinchan's house, sparking curiosity and surprise.
Shinchan eagerly explores Ben’s Omnitrix powers during a sunny Kasukabe town stroll.
Alien villain Zarkon attacks Kasukabe; Ben and Shinchan face a tense first battle.
Shinchan and friends use wild antics to distract and frustrate the alien invader.
Ben repairs the Omnitrix and, with Shinchan, defeats Zarkon aboard his ship.
Ben bids heartfelt goodbye to Shinchan outside his house, ending their adventure warmly.
Post-credits reveal: Omnitrix gains chaotic new Shinchan-inspired alien form, surprising Ben.
